FuncDef: The reset dhcp server statistics command clears statistics on the DHCP server.
ExtraInfo: This command applies to DHCP servers. Collecting statistics on the DHCP messages sent and received within a specified period helps you locate DHCP faults. Run the reset dhcp server statistics command to clear original statistics on DHCP messages and then run the display dhcp server statistics to view message statistics on the DHCP server.
